00020 #include "TriangleMeshExplicit.h"
00021 #include "assert.h"
00022 
00023 
00024 namespace brics_3d {
00025 
00026 TriangleMeshExplicit::TriangleMeshExplicit() {
00027         triangles = new std::vector<Triangle> ();
00028         triangles->clear();
00029 
00030 }
00031 
00032 TriangleMeshExplicit::~TriangleMeshExplicit() {
00033         if (triangles != NULL) {
00034                 triangles->clear();
00035                 delete triangles;
00036         }
00037 }
00038 
00039 std::vector<Triangle>* TriangleMeshExplicit::getTriangles() {
00040         return triangles;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void TriangleMeshExplicit::setTriangles(std::vector<Triangle>* triangles) {
00044         if (this->triangles != NULL) {
00045                 this->triangles->clear();
00046                 delete this->triangles;
00047         }
00048         this->triangles = triangles;
00049 }
00050 
00051 int TriangleMeshExplicit::getSize() {
00052         return static_cast<int>(triangles->size());
00053 }
00054 
00055 int TriangleMeshExplicit::getNumberOfVertices() {
00056         return (this->getSize() * 3); //each triangle has three dedicated vertices.
00057 }
00058 
00059 Point3D* TriangleMeshExplicit::getTriangleVertex(int triangleIndex, int vertexIndex) {
00060         /* check if parameters are in range */
00061         assert ((0 <= triangleIndex) && (triangleIndex < this->getSize()));
00062         assert ((0 <= vertexIndex) && (vertexIndex <= 2));
00063 
00064         return (*triangles)[triangleIndex].getVertex(vertexIndex);
00065 }
00066 
00067 int TriangleMeshExplicit::addTriangle(Point3D vertex1, Point3D vertex2, Point3D vertex3) {
00068         triangles->push_back(Triangle(vertex1, vertex2, vertex3));
00069         return (getSize() - 1); // inserted as last entry
00070 }
00071 
00072 int TriangleMeshExplicit::addTriangle(Triangle triangle) {
00073         triangles->push_back(triangle);
00074         return (getSize() - 1); // inserted as last entry
00075 }
00076 
00077 void TriangleMeshExplicit::removeTriangle (int triangleIndex) {
00078 //      triangles->erase(triangleIndex); // FIXME
00079 }
00080 
00081 void TriangleMeshExplicit::homogeneousTransformation(IHomogeneousMatrix44 *transformation) {
00082         for (int i = 0; i < this->getSize(); ++i) { // propagate transformation to triangles
00083                 (*triangles)[i].homogeneousTransformation(transformation);
00084         }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void TriangleMeshExplicit::read(std::istream& inStream) {
00088         //TODO
00089 }
00090 
00091 void TriangleMeshExplicit::write(std::ostream& outStream) {
00092         for (int i = 0; i < this->getSize(); ++i) {
00093                 outStream << (*triangles)[i] << std::endl;
00094         }
00095 }
